QuestData.Title: Deal's Off
QuestData.Description: There's one more farm left, far to the west. They're real close to the kraul.$b$bDeal works the land by herself. If anyone got hit bad, it'd be her. It's just past the worst part of the collapse, so keep an eye out for the quilboar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Deal Farmstead for any survivors.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad to know the others are safe. But not for long if we don't do something about these quilboar!
